talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thank you!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
I can sense that a crack has been formed at Riverwort Wharf.
Please go there now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Contract of Darkness$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
I can feel dark aura coming from Riverwort Wharf.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Go)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
(It is a crack that is connected to the Boundary of Dimensions.)

* You cannot proceed in a party.

(You must enter alone.)

* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Spirit of Death$
What are you doing here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thanks for the welcome.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Woah, who do we have here?
It's my poor contractor human!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Sorry to disappoint you but I'm still alive and well.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
The fact that we met again means…
Your death is near...?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's different from what you told me earlier! You said only the goddess knows about my death!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Yeah, your voice is still loud and full of vigour.
But this is a boundary of darkness… Living beings can't enter this place.
Which means there's no guarantee you can leave this place alive.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Concentrate! I shouldn't be played around by that devil.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
I know, that's what I said.
But who knew you'd enter the dimension of death yourself?
Really, only the goddess would have known. Hahaha!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're satisfied with that?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Well, you came earlier than I expected. Thanks for your soul.
Considering the length of our contract, I'll let you choose how you will die.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You aren't doing justice to your name.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
…?
What do you mean by that, human?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You said you don't want an ordinary soul, but a soul just before death, didn't you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
What?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You've waited for hundreds of years and now you're going to eat the soul from a boring death?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Yeah?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If I become stronger, you're going to get yourself a more violent death filled with horror.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm here to make this thing clear about our contract.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Hmm… Continue, human.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I realised that the power I am using now is only a fraction of what you can do.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
You're here to make the contract clear…
What do you mean by that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It wouldn't be bad for you if I meet my death after I've become stronger.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Not bad, human.
So you want my full power?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Check?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Hmm… All right. Aged soul like aged wine tastes better.
But let me check one thing first.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What if I lose?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
I need to know if you're capable of using my full power.
I can accept your offer if you win against your duplicate who represents your death.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>……Sure.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
You will die in the hands of your own death and I will enjoy myself on your delectable soul just before you die.
Of course, I agree that it would be less tasty than your soul after you've grown stronger.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Go)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
(It is a crack that is connected to the Boundary of Dimensions.)

* You cannot proceed in a party.

(You must enter alone.)

* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Spirit of Death$
Well, try your best in fighting your own death.
Too bad if you lose, but I'll still enjoy your soul as my snack.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I told you I’m a genius sorceress.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Whoa, not bad, human.
It seems like I've been belittling you.
Just like what you said, it would be a pity for you to die right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Accepted!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
I, Death, darkness born from nightmare promise to lend you my full power from this point onwards.
You can use it until your death is near.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I have no plans of returning either! </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Great. I hope we won't see each other here ever again unless you're dead.
Your soul makes my mouth water.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Spirit of Death$
Oh yeah? Then there's nothing more for us to talk about. Now, off you go.
I want to take a rest.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Goodness gracious!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Arch Heretic$
Did you meet the darkness?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>From when were you standing there? Can't you at least tell me if you're around?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Arch Heretic$
…….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't say that. It makes me feel like there's a ghost following me!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Arch Heretic$
I'm sorry.
Looking at the creature behind you… It seems stronger than before.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey… were you worried about me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Arch Heretic$
I guess there's no need for me to worry anymore. I'll be on my way.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hmph, we're in the same boat using the power of darkness. Let's be good friends.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Arch Heretic$
I guess I chose wrong words.
I will correct it to "you're none of my concern now".

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You know, build connections and share information...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Arch Heretic$
Farewell.

$Spirit of Death$
(The dimension starts to become distorted.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't know if the goddess was doing something but I know I almost died.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
You're back! I was worried about you.
It seems like you've met the being of darkness.
This is all thanks to the Goddess's arrangements.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Er… maybe?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
Haha, {user_nick}, you sure are realistic.
Maybe that's what saved your life from darkness and allowed you to come back alive.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No one has ever said that they could count on me before.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
What a relief. It's a dangerous power but I have a feeling I can count on you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'll take that as a compliment.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
Is that so?
Maybe the power of darkness can only be kept in check by someone like you, {user_nick}.
Ordinary humans will only get devoured by the darkness…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Haha, I like that more.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
(Rosetta gives you a mysterious smile.)
Let's say farewell for now.
May the Goddess's..., No, {user_nick}, may your journey be full of luck.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Reward$</html>

No one knows if my death will arrive tomorrow or a few decades down the row.
If there really is a goddess, she's probably the only person who knows about it just like what Death said…
But I have no regrets on my choice.
I would at least be living my life to the fullest while I'm alive.
* You can now awaken as Black Mara. Open the Skill Window and check your skills.

$Arch Heretic$
(Huh? Where did he go?!)

journal.title: Boundary of Dimensions
journal.contents:
Look for Boundary of Dimensions in Riverwort Wharf.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf - Boundary of Dimensions
journal.destination: (Solo) Look for Boundary of Dimensions in Riverwort Wharf
journal.todo_msg: Look for Boundary of Dimensions at Riverwort Wharf.

journal.title: Encounter with Death
journal.contents:
Talk to Death who has appeared at the Boundary of Dimensions.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf (Boundary of Dimensions) - Spirit of Death

journal.title: Fight with Death
journal.contents:
Win the battle against your own death.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf (Boundary of Dimensions) - Battle with Death
journal.todo_msg: Battle with your own death at the Boundary of Dimensions.

journal.title: Contract of Darkness
journal.contents:
You have won the battle against your own death. Talk to Death.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf (Boundary of Dimensions) - Spirit of Death

journal.title: Talk to Arch Heretic.
journal.contents:
You've been forced out of Boundary of Dimensions and ended up in Riverwort Wharf. Arch Heretic is standing right in front of you. Talk to him.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf - Arch Heretic
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Arch Heretic at Riverwort Wharf

journal.title: Birth of Black Mara
journal.contents:
Go back to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta in Saint Haven.

Saint Haven - Priestess of Darkness Rosetta
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta.
